QAPair.Question: Do you have information about Lactose tolerance tests
QAPair.Answer: Lactose tolerance tests measure the ability of your intestines to break down a type of sugar called lactose. This sugar is found in milk and other dairy products. If your body cannot break down this sugar, you are said to have lactose intolerance . This can cause gassiness, abdominal pain, cramps, and diarrhea.
